artist: Illustrator: Jim Dine; Publisher: Petersburg Press Ltd., London
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: script for a stage play with images (primarily sketches for costumes) and notes; green velvet cover with title in silver; black slipcase; colophon page indicates that Edition B included four loose signed etchings--these were not included
image_copyright: © 1968 Jim Dine %2F Petersburg Press Ltd.%2C London
medium: Color lithographs and etchings, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017
signed: on colophon page, in green: Edition B Jim Dine 57/200
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
